meanings.sent1: The ascendent leader quickly gained the respect of the community.
meanings.sent2: Her ascendent position in the company allowed her to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The ascendent student became the teacher's favorite due to her rapid progress.
meanings.sent4: His ascendent popularity among his peers made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The ascendent sun cast a warm glow over the horizon, signaling a new day.

meanings.sent4: His ascendent presence in the room silenced all other voices.

meanings.sent1: She discovered an old photo of her ascendent, a brave soldier from the past.
